column5: Relax in the woods, while you enjoy a cultural, sports, gastronomic and shopping experience in The Woodlands and the Houston area. The house in newly renovated. It is all in one floor, it has 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms, a large living room and an open kitchen.. It is located in Panther Creek, one of the oldest Villages of The Woodlands, near to The Woodlands Mall. Market Street, supermarkets, cinemas and restaurants.
column8: Spacious and luminous house in The Woodlands
